snippet: Scores of lawsuits involving thousands of former players touched by concussions and brain injuries have been consolidated into one master complaint, setting up a huge case for the N.F.L.
abstract: Scores of lawsuits involving thousands of former players touched by concussions and brain injuries are consolidated into one master complaint, setting up a huge case for the NFL; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Scores of lawsuits involving thousands of former players touched by concussions and brain injuries have been consolidated into one master complaint, setting up a huge case for the N.F.L.

headline.seo: Head Injury Lawsuits Against N.F.L. Consolidated
headline.main: Head Injury Lawsuits Against N.F.L. Consolidated
